questions.question: Which time period after 2020 saw the greatest stock price growth?

key_insights: The closing prices of silver remained relatively stable from 2020 to 2025.
The observed steep slope of the trendline in both the third and fourth quarters of 2025 indicates significant growth during these two quarters.
However, the slope of the line in the fourth quarter of 2025 is still steeper than that in the third quarter of 2025.
Therefore, it can be said that the average closing price in the fourth quarter of 2025 saw the largest increase.

reasoning.reasoning: First, use the Zoom Time Range tool to focus on data after 2020, where a period of sharp growth is observed. Next, try zoom into the end of 2025 and the begin of 2026 to see the exact date.
After using the resample time tool, you can precisely locate the segment with the steepest slope, identifying the point of greatest change. No further tools are required.
